name: Dungeon Scoundrel
description:
Guide a dirty rotten, good-for-nothing scoundrel in their hunt for the devil through the scandalous dungeon.

Made for 7DRL 2017.

Check out my other games, or follow me on Twitter for development updates.

Version 1.3:

  • Fixed crash when dropping an item

Version 1.2:

  • Fixed major memory leaks.
  • End-of-game stats now include the real time spent.
  • Now only 1 flavor of tea, rather than 3.
  • Duplicate text lines will now be collapsed into one line.
